ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Iksar Illousion :\
ygData.msgSnippet: I thionk someone else said it, but I ll say it again. Find the Iskar Bandit camp, with the huts. Close to the center of the zone. Kill all the wanderers, and
ygData.messageBody:
I thionk someone else said it, but I'll say it again. Find the Iskar Bandit
camp, with the huts. Close to the center of the zone. Kill all the
wanderers, and keep your eye out for the Ton Warrior. I got 4 in one hour, a
buddy went and did it last night and got him within 15 minutes. Just keep
your eye out, he'll wander off.

-Dysin
40th Circle Enchanter, Fennin Ro

----- Original Message -----
From: James <mailto:manickd@...>
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com <mailto:eqenchanters@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 12:20 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Iksar Illousion :\

Ok I spent 7 hours at the Frogloc city and didn't see a Ton warrior once. I
saw 3 Ton shaman, but not one Warrior :\ I went by what I read on the net!
Is there a better way to do this? Like do the Hooky Pooky before each spawn
heheheehe?

Sorry just hate taking time, I could have had fun instead of Doing EverCamp.
Well if any one can help on this one please speak up now :)
